item.title: Someone help me with a little problem
item.dc:creator: @pk0r pk0r
item.description:
@pk0r wrote:

basically i want to put a welcoming message when people joins my server =\ i allready done that
sM(“Welcome to Charlie Scape”);

sM(“01/07/2009 - Server is Open.”);

but now i want to make Message Welcome to Charlie Scape in blue colour and have a crown next to it… any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 10:42:25 am[/size][hr]bump
